title: Crowded Lab with Dark Blue Carpet and White Walls
description: A busy lab space filled with scattered chairs and various lab equipment on a dark blue carpet. The well-lit room has white walls. There are close-up images of people's legs, wearing a mix of jeans, khakis, and lab coats, with different types of shoes such as sneakers, loafers, and lab shoes. The carpet shows signs of wear, with slight stains and impressions from furniture. Electrical cables snake across, connecting various workstations, and some chairs are tipped over or askew, adding to the sense of activity. Light streaming in from big windows highlights dust particles floating in the air.

Chairs mismatched in location, desktops cluttered with diverse scientific tools casting a busy atmosphere. The lab is brightly illuminated.
foreground_prompt: An orange cone toppled under a card table, poorly lit making it hard to spot.
background_prompt: Floor of the lab is covered with a well-trodden dark blue carpet leading to white walls dressed with information boards. Close-up leg view in office shoes and lab footwear. Chairs mismatched in location, desktops cluttered with diverse scientific tools casting a busy atmosphere. The lab is brightly illuminated.

title: Laboratory buzz
description: Dark blue carpet filled with science papers and towels extend across the lab with white walls featuring posters. Various legs move about in slip-resistant shoes and formal office shoes. Scattered chairs and lab benches crowded with devices. The entire space is well-lit by overhead lab lights.
foreground_prompt: An orange cone upright but shadowed under an equipment rack, hard to see.
background_prompt: Dark blue carpet filled with science papers and towels extend across the lab with white walls featuring posters. Various legs move about in slip-resistant shoes and formal office shoes. Scattered chairs and lab benches crowded with devices. The entire space is well-lit by overhead lab lights.
